# Control Flow

## Exercise

- Create a FizzBuzz program

```rust
fn main() {
    // let i = 15;
    // let i = 3;
    // let i = 5;
    let i = 47;
    if (i % 3 == 0) && (i % 5 == 0) {
        println!("FizzBuzz")
    } else if i % 3 == 0 {
        println!("Fizz")
    } else if i % 5 == 0 {
        println!("Buzz")
    }
}
```
